content: seeing is believing has been designed for the 2024 mn yarn shop hop the inspiration was the cottingley fairies which is not exactly a fairy tale but indeed a tale about fairies we have a few skeins remaining of fiber macgyver s beautiful yarn find it here while supplies last 1 this scarf is crocheted using a combination of single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet tc stitches each row has written out directions 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/as-seen-in-newsletter/p/shop-hop-yarn-2024-x81264028 htm
